attributes.action: Instate an act similar to America's Stolen Valor Act of 2005
attributes.additional_details: There is one such group known as The Walter Mitty Hunters Club which find such people who falsely claimed to have won medals and have found a staggering amount of people who claim to have served.
attributes.background: Online there are hundreds of people posing as soldiers that have received medals (such as the George cross)for their "service". When in fact they are a fantasist. These people lower the value of bravery for our service men and women who have done extraordinary acts to warrant such a medal.
